prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: A full-body portrait of an extremely handsome young man with sharp, refined facial features, standing centered on a pure white background, in the style of Impressionist oil painting with rich chiaroscuro and visible brushstrokes. He has a pale, almost luminous complexion, high cheekbones, and a defined jawline. His eyes are captivating, intelligent, and slightly melancholic, with irises of a unique, pale silver-grey color that seem to hold a moonlit depth, framed by long, dark eyelashes. His eyebrows are well-defined and elegant. His nose is straight and noble, and his lips are full yet set in a contemplative, neutral expression that conveys immense intellect and a subtle, magnetic charisma. His hair is dark, deep raven-black, with subtle indigo undertones, styled in a slightly tousled, medium-length cut that falls just above his shoulders, with a few strands casually framing his forehead. He possesses a lean, athletic, and tall physique indicative of high physical prowess. He wears a tailored, dark charcoal grey Victorian-inspired frock coat over a crisp, high-collared white shirt, both garments made of fine, textured fabrics. The coat is adorned with subtle silver thread embroidery resembling abstract lunar phases and celestial patterns along the cuffs and lapels. A silver chain with a small, intricate pendant depicting a crescent moon rests against his shirt. His trousers are fitted and black, tucked into polished, knee-high leather boots. His posture is upright yet relaxed, emanating an aura of calm authority, keen observation, and profound inner strength, perfectly suited for a logical deduction-based mystery adventure. The lighting dramatically sculpts his form, creating strong contrasts between light and shadow. No text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

side.prompt:
Generate a full-body, side-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Facing left. Standing with arms relaxed at sides.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

back.prompt:
Generate a full-body, back-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. No facial features should be visible.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
